item.title: Oh cool new washing machine is ruining the delicates
item.description: Are we getting warmer? The washing and drying machine units in our apartment was replaced because the drying machine was taking two plus cycles to do any drying and the washing machine came along for the ride. However, the new washing machine was basically destroying the delicates that required cold water. Somehow even on the coldest water setting, the water still ended up being too hot. One example, of what the super hot water was doing to the colors, Look behind you!
